meaningMnemonic: In the <radical>morning</radical>, you use a <radical>gun</radical> on your <radical>nose</radical> to make it <kanji>dry</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: This technique for a nice <kanji>dry</kanji> nose was invented by Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん)! Well, not him, but someone who worked under him. You see, he had a bit of a damp nose problem.
